span.span: Represents the base class for classes that contain event data, and provides a value to use for events that do not include event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可做為表示事件資料的所有類別的基底類別。This class serves as the base class for all classes that represent event data. 例如，類別衍生自並用來保存資料的組件載入事件。For example, the class derives from and is used to hold the data for assembly load events. 若要建立自訂事件資料類別，請建立衍生自類別類別，並提供儲存必要資料的屬性。To create a custom event data class, create a class that derives from the class and provide the properties to store the necessary data. 您的自訂事件資料類別名稱應以結尾`EventArgs`。The name of your custom event data class should end with `EventArgs`. 若要傳遞的物件，不會包含任何資料，使用欄位。To pass an object that does not contain any data, use the field. 如需有關事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)發行項。For more information about events, see the [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md) article. ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為的自訂事件資料類別`ThresholdReachedEventArgs`衍生自類別。The following example shows a custom event data class named `ThresholdReachedEventArgs` that derives from the class. 事件資料類別的執行個體傳遞至事件處理常式`ThresholdReached`事件。An instance of the event data class is passed to the event handler for the `ThresholdReached` event.
